class.name: DV_BoxPlot
class.brief_description: Box-and-whisker chart that can derive quartiles from series data or accept manual statistics.
class.description:
DV_BoxPlot visualizes statistical distributions per category. Provide raw samples via [method DVChart.add_series] or call [method add_box] with pre-computed quartiles. The control optionally displays outliers, supports configurable box width and group spacing, and emits hover/click signals for interactivity.
[codeblocks] [gdscript]
extends DV_BoxPlot
func _ready() -> void: set_title("Box Plot: Returns by Sector") set_y_axis_label("Return (%)") set_categories(["Tech", "Health", "Energy"])
add_series("Tech", PackedFloat32Array([2, 5, 7, 1, 9, 4, 6, 8, 3, 10])) add_series("Health", PackedFloat32Array([1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9])) add_series("Energy", PackedFloat32Array([-2, 0, 1, 3, 3, 4, 8]))
set_show_outliers(true) set_gap_group(12.0) set_box_width_frac(0.55)
box_clicked.connect(_on_box_clicked) box_hovered.connect(_on_box_hovered) [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]
Details on base class helpers such as [method DVChart.add_series] and [method DVChart.set_categories] are documented under [DVChart].

method.name: get_box_rect
method.description: Returns the screen-space rectangle of the box for hit testing or overlay drawing.

method.name: get_group_count
method.description: Returns how many box groups are currently available.

method.name: set_box_width_frac
method.description: Sets the fraction of the category lane occupied by each box (clamped between 0 and 1).

method.name: set_gap_group
method.description: Adjusts the spacing in pixels between neighboring box groups.

members.member: Toggles rendering of points that fall outside the whisker range.

signal.name: box_clicked
signal.description: Emitted when a box is clicked. Provides the group index and computed median value.

signal.name: box_hovered
signal.description: Emitted while the pointer hovers a box. Includes the group index and median for convenience.
